snippet: Kosovo will play its first FIFA-approved friendly on Wednesday, against Haiti, but many top soccer players with Kosovar heritage have ended up playing for other national teams.
abstract: Kosovo prepares to play its first FIFA-approved friendly match, against Haiti, though without United Nations membership, country remains unable to officially join soccer's international governing body; many top soccer players of Kosovar heritage have ended up playing for other national teams.
lead_paragraph: Kosovo will play its first FIFA-approved friendly on Wednesday, against Haiti, but many top soccer players with Kosovar heritage have ended up playing for other national teams.

headline.main: Kosovo Gets a Real Game, if It Can Assemble a Team
headline.print_headline: Kosovo Gets a Real Game, if It Can Assemble a Team
